headline: Is Truist Financial (TFC) the Best Regional Bank Dividend Stock to Buy?
summary: We recently published a list of the 11 Best Regional Bank Dividend Stocks to Buy. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Truist Financial Corporation (NYSE:TFC) stands against other best regional bank dividend stocks.
